sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"相信，信任"之意。
means: believe ： 普通用词，常表示一种缓和、不太肯定的口气。
trust ： 指绝对相信或信赖某人。
confide ： 侧重忠诚可靠与可信赖。
rely ： 指在相信的基础上可进一步依靠，着重可靠性。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"认为"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: consider, think, believe, count, deem, reckon, regard
means: consider ： 指经过考虑和观察后得出的结论。
think ： 普通用词，指按照自己的意见提出看法。
believe ： 通常指根据一定的证据，经思考后而认为属实。
count ： 指作出判断后而得出的看法等。
deem ： 正式用词，常用于法律、文学，强调作判断而不是思考。
reckon ： 指对人或事作全面"权衡"，把各方面意见考虑进去后得出结论。
regard ： 侧重凭外表或表面现象作判断。多强调观点。

sentences.en: I quite believe!
sentences.cn: 我非常相信。

sentences.en: I believe that man.
sentences.cn: 我相信那个人。

sentences.en: Believe it or not, that's the way it is.
sentences.cn: 信不信由你, 反正事情就是这样。

sentences.en: I believe you are right.
sentences.cn: 我相信你是对的。

sentences.en: I quite believe what you say.
sentences.cn: 我完全相信你的话。

sentences.en: I believe my sister to be honest.
sentences.cn: 我认为我姐姐是诚实的。

sentences.en: We believe him an excellent student.
sentences.cn: 我们认为他是个优秀学生。

means.word_mean: 对…信以为真，相信…的真实性

sentences.en: Don't believe everything you hear.
sentences.cn: 别相信你所听到的一切事情。

means.word_mean: 相信(别人的)陈述(或诺言)，相信(某人)的话
据信(某人或某事)已参与某行动或卷入某局面
以为，认为，想；料想，猜想[与名词从句连用]

sentences.en: I believe that she has left the city.
sentences.cn: 我认为她已离城了。

sentences.en: They believe in Christianity.
sentences.cn: 他们信仰基督教。

means.word_mean: 信以为真、真实等(常与in连用)

sentences.en: Only if one believes in something can one act purposefully.
sentences.cn: 除非某人相信某事，否则某人决不会果断地行动。(或：只有某人相信某事，某人才会果断地行动。)

data.mean: 把（某事）当真；认为有可能
believe in sth 认为某事好（或对、可接受）

sentence.cn: 听到妈妈说，“我真不敢相信今天早上报纸上印的是什么”，这让我想从她手中把报纸拿过来，自己阅读。
sentence.en: Hearing mom say,   " I can’t believe what’s printed in the newspaper this morning,  "  made me want to grab it out of her hands and read it myself.
sentence.from: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

sentence.cn: 这是相信生活及其可能性的部分。
sentence.en: It's the part that believes in life and its possibilities.
sentence.from: 2015年高考英语福建卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

mean.mean: 把（某事）当真；认为有可能

jx.jx_en_mean: used to concede that a proposition or statement is surprising
jx.jx_cn_mean: 信不信由你（表示说的话令人吃惊）

lj.lj_ly: believe it or not, the speaker was none other than Horace.
lj.lj_ls: 信不信由你，演讲者就是霍勒斯。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to emphasize the truth of a statement or assertion
jx.jx_cn_mean: （请你）相信我的话（强调话语的真实性）

lj.lj_ly: believe me, it is well worth the effort.
lj.lj_ls: 相信我的话，这值得花工夫。

phrase.cizu_name: be unable to (或 be hardly able to) believe

jx.jx_cn_mean: 无法相信，简直不敢相信（表示对某事感到惊奇）

lj.lj_ly: Clarke could hardly believe his luck as he put the ball into the empty net.
lj.lj_ls: 克拉克简直不敢相信运气那么好，竟把球打进了空袋。

phrase.cizu_name: be unable to (或 be hardly able to) believe one's e

jx.jx_en_mean: be amazed by what one sees or hears
jx.jx_cn_mean: 无法（或简直不敢）相信自己的眼睛（或耳朵）（表示对所见或所闻感到惊讶）

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express disbelief in the truth of a statement

lj.lj_ly: he says he is left of centre, but don't you believe it.
lj.lj_ls: 他说他的立场观点中间偏左，别信他。

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express surprise at something one is relating
jx.jx_cn_mean: 你会相信吗？（对所说之事表示惊讶）

lj.lj_ly: they're still arguing, would you believe it?.
lj.lj_ls: 他们还在争论，真是怪事!。

jx.jx_en_mean: have faith in the truth or existence of
jx.jx_cn_mean: 相信（…的真实性）；相信（…的存在）；信仰

jx.jx_en_mean: be of the opinion that (something) is right, proper, or desirable
jx.jx_cn_mean: 认为（某事）是正确的（或合适的、必要的）

lj.lj_ly: I don't believe in censorship of the arts.
lj.lj_ls: 我认为不应对艺术进行审查。

entry.def: If you believe that something is true, you think that it is true, but you are not sure.

example.ex: Experts believe that the coming drought will be extensive...
example.tran: 专家们认为即将发生的旱灾将侵袭大片地区。

example.ex: I believe you have something of mine...
example.tran: 我想你拿了我什么东西。

entry.def: If you believe someone or if you believe what they say or write, you accept that they are telling the truth.

example.ex: He did not sound as if he believed her...
example.tran: 他听起来似乎并不相信她。

example.ex: Never believe anything a married man says about his wife...
example.tran: 永远不要相信一个已婚男人说的任何有关他妻子的话。

entry.def: If you believe in fairies, ghosts, or miracles, you are sure that they exist or happen. If you believe in a god, you are sure of the existence of that god.

example.tran: 你相信魔法真的存在吗？

entry.def: If you believe in a way of life or an idea, you are in favour of it because you think it is good or right.
entry.tran: 认为…是应该的（或正确的）

example.tran: 信奉民主政治的正派候选人

entry.def: If you believe in someone or what they are doing, you have confidence in them and think that they will be successful.

example.ex: If you believe in yourself you can succeed.

entry.def: Believe is used in expressions such as I can't believe how or it's hard to believe that in order to express surprise, for example because something bad has happened or something very difficult has been achieved.

example.ex: Many officers I spoke to found it hard to believe what was happening around them...
example.tran: 很多和我谈过的官员都觉得发生在他们周围的事情令人难以置信。

example.ex: I was a physical and emotional wreck — I still can't believe how I ever got any work done.
example.tran: 我那时身心俱疲——现在还难以相信我是怎么把一些事情做成的。

entry.def: If you say that you cannot believe your eyes or cannot believe your ears, you are emphasizing that you are very surprised about something you have seen or heard.
entry.tran: （表示对所见所闻惊讶不已）相信自己的眼睛/耳朵

example.ex: I could not believe my eyes. She was far more beautiful than I had imagined.
example.tran: 我简直不敢相信自己的眼睛。她比我想象的漂亮多了。

entry.def: You can use believe it or not to emphasize that what you have just said is surprising.
entry.tran: （强调刚才所述之事令人吃惊）信不信由你

example.ex: That's normal, believe it or not.

entry.def: If you say would you believe it, you are emphasizing your surprise about something.
entry.tran: （强调对某事感到惊讶）你会相信吗？

example.ex: And would you believe it, he's younger than me!

entry.def: You can use believe you me to emphasize that what you are saying is true.

example.ex: It's absolutely amazing, believe you me.

means.word_mean: 1. accept as true; take to be true;

sentences.sentence: "We didn't believe his stories from the War"

means.word_mean: 2. judge or regard; look upon; judge;

sentences.sentence: "I believe her to be very smart"
"I think that he is her boyfriend"
"The racist conceives such people to be inferior"
"I believe that he will come back from the war"

means.word_mean: 4. follow a credo; have a faith; be a believer;

sentences.sentence: "When you hear his sermons, you will be able to believe, too"
"Should we believe a publication like the National Inquirer?"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English  belȳfan, belēfan, alteration of gelēfan, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch geloven and German glauben, also to lief

sentences.cn: “他还在那里工作吗？”“我想是 / 不是。”
sentences.en: ‘Does he still work there? ’ ‘I believe so/not . ’

sentences.cn: 有三位船员失踪。相信是淹死了。
sentences.en: Three sailors are missing, believed drowned.

sentences.cn: 相信我，她不适合你。
sentences.en: Believe me, she's not right for you.

sentences.cn: 一点也不要相信那些话。
sentences.en: Don't believe a word of it (= don't believe any part of what sb is saying) .

sentences.cn: 人们一度认为地球是平的。
sentences.en: People used to believe (that) the earth was flat.

sentences.cn: 他不愿相信他的儿子沾染毒品。
sentences.en: He refused to believe (that) his son was involved in drugs.

sentences.cn: 我的确相信你是对的。
sentences.en: I do believe you're right (= I think sth is true, even though it is surprising).

sentences.cn: 警方认为那个人可能携有武器。
sentences.en: Police believe (that) the man may be armed.

sentences.cn: 据信那对夫妇已经离开了这个国家。
sentences.en: It is believed that the couple have left the country.

sentences.cn: 那些花瓶据估计每个价值都超过2万元。
sentences.en: The vases are believed to be worth over $20 000 each.

sentences.cn: “她是哪里人？”“我想是西班牙人。”
sentences.en: ‘Where does she come from? ’ ‘Spain, I believe. ’

sentences.cn: 我对此感到难以相信。
sentences.en: I find that hard to believe .

sentences.cn: 我不相信你的话！
sentences.en: I don't believe you!

sentences.cn: 我很多年都对他的谎话信以为真。
sentences.en: I believed his lies for years.

sentences.cn: 那个男人自称是社会福利工作者，老妇人信以为真。
sentences.en: The man claimed to be a social worker and the old woman believed him.

sentences.cn: 我那时身心俱疲——现在还难以相信我是怎么把一些事情做成的。
sentences.en: I was a physical and emotional wreck — I still can't believe how I ever got any work done.

sentences.cn: 我简直不敢相信自己的眼睛。她比我想象的漂亮多了。
sentences.en: I could not believe my eyes. She was far more beautiful than I had imagined.

sentences.cn: 那很正常，信不信由你。
sentences.en: That's normal, believe it or not.

sentences.cn: 你信吗？他比我年轻！
sentences.en: And would you believe it, he's younger than me!

sentences.cn: 这太不可思议了，真的。
sentences.en: It's absolutely amazing, believe you me.

sentences.cn: 只要自信，就能成功。
sentences.en: If you believe in yourself you can succeed.

sentences.cn: 很多和我谈过的官员都觉得发生在他们周围的事情令人难以置信。
sentences.en: Many officers I spoke to found it hard to believe what was happening around them...

sentences.cn: 专家们认为即将发生的旱灾将侵袭大片地区。
sentences.en: Experts believe that the coming drought will be extensive...

sentences.cn: 我想你拿了我什么东西。
sentences.en: I believe you have something of mine...

sentences.cn: 他听起来似乎并不相信她。
sentences.en: He did not sound as if he believed her...

sentences.cn: 永远不要相信一个已婚男人说的任何有关他妻子的话。
sentences.en: Never believe anything a married man says about his wife...

sentences.cn: 我不相信有鬼。
sentences.en: I don't believe in ghosts...

sentences.cn: 你相信魔法真的存在吗？
sentences.en: Do you believe in magic?

sentences.cn: 他认为婚内应该忠诚。
sentences.en: He believed in marital fidelity.

sentences.cn: 信奉民主政治的正派候选人
sentences.en: ...decent candidates who believed in democracy.

sentences.cn: 信任是一种神圣的使命.
sentences.en: Believing was a sacred duty.

sentences.cn: 孔子只信任政府, 一个道貌岸然的国王, 一个富有同情心的统治者.
sentences.en: Confucius believed in just government, a moral king, a compassionate ruler.

sentences.cn: 我们信任你方在见到我方汇票时即照付.
sentences.en: We believe you will pay our draftpresentation.

sentences.cn: 届时我们将发现,奥巴马政府是否带来了我们大家能够信任的变革.
sentences.en: We will all then discover whether administration offers change we can believe in.

sentences.cn: 没有人听到这些声音 、 没有人相信他的话, 也没有人可以信任.
sentences.en: No one heard these voices, no one believed him, and no one can be trusted.

sentences.cn: 几个人当中, 只有我信任她.
sentences.en: Out of a number of people, I was the only one who believed her.

sentences.cn: 她信任无法让人 信赖 的人.
sentences.en: She believed a person who simply had no reason to " believe . "

sentences.cn: 杰:在电脑里, 他们会相信任何事情.
sentences.en: If it's in the computer, they believe anything.

sentences.cn: 人们都说,一个不会忘我的投入到喜好中的人是不可信任的.
sentences.en: People keep saying you that could never believe in a person with no devotions.

sentences.cn: 你可以信任他, 他不会使你失望.
sentences.en: You can believe in him, he will never let you down.

sentences.cn: 我从他们的握手可以看出他们并不信任我.
sentences.en: I could tell from their headshakes that they didn't believe me.

sentences.cn: 阿泰从不信任delete键,因为他从没错过.
sentences.en: Ron Artest doesn't believe in the DELETE button because hes never wrong.

sentences.cn: 这也是源于米兰的管理层一直信任我.
sentences.en: Also, the chance that those at the helm of Milan have always believed in me.

sentences.cn: 我仍然无法信任我是在接收去年获得的这个嘉奖.
sentences.en: I still cannot believe that I am taking up my prize that was won last year.

sentences.cn: 那些信任别人的人总是最受人爱戴的.
sentences.en: Those most loved invariably those who have the capacity for believing in others.

sentences.cn: 她信任我,而我无论如何也不能再走邪路了.
sentences.en: She believes in me and I would never do another crooked thing for the whole world.

sentences.cn: 她不相信任何人告诉她的任何事情.
sentences.en: She does not believe anything that anyone tells her.

sentences.cn: 弗兰克是个诚实的人, 我们可以信任并依赖她.
sentences.en: Frank is a man eating no fish, so we can believe in and depend on him.

sentences.cn: 我坚信,任何困难都难不倒英雄的中国人民 ( 胡锦涛 )!
sentences.en: I firmly believe that no difficulty can daunt the valiant Chinese people ( by president Hu ).

sentences.cn: 也要信任, 在您享用紧张生的职权上.
sentences.en: Believe too, in your entitlement to an easier life.

sentences.cn: 你要信任你是最糟的,再用真力证实大家.
sentences.en: You must believe that you are the best and then make sure that you are.

sentences.cn: 我们都信任他, 他是个诚实的人.
sentences.en: We all believe in him. He an honest person.

sentences.cn: 我们信任他.
sentences.en: We believe in him.

sentences.cn: 不会有人再会相信任何人说的任何话了.
sentences.en: Nobody believes anything anybody is saying any more.

sentences.cn: 最重要的是,一个指导者必须信任他带领的人.
sentences.en: Essentially a director must believe in the person he is guiding.

sentences.cn: 我们信任他, 他总是说话算话的.
sentences.en: We believe in him, who is always true to his word.

sentences.cn: 他不相信任何人.
sentences.en: He doesn't believe anyone.

sentences.cn: 证据表明他有罪, 现在你得决定你信任谁.
sentences.en: The evidences argues that he is guilty, now you have to decide who to believe in.

sentences.cn: 即使世界充满猜疑, 我们也要勇于信任.
sentences.en: And in a world filled with distrust, we must still dare to believe.

sentences.cn: 经理信任他.
sentences.en: The manager believes in him.

sentences.cn: 亨德森一家很少去教堂做礼拜, 但他们笃信宗教.
sentences.en: The Hendersons seldom go to church, but they believe.

sentences.cn: 你确信他在说谎吗？我不相信他会干这种事。
sentences.en: Are you sure he was lying? I can't believe that of him.

sentences.cn: 我简直无法相信！你在这里干什么？
sentences.en: I don't believe it! What are you doing here?

sentences.cn: 她走进来时我简直不相信自己的眼睛。
sentences.en: I couldn't believe my eyes when she walked in.

sentences.cn: 你相信有上帝吗？
sentences.en: Do you believe in God?

sentences.cn: 她简直无法相信整件事又在重演。
sentences.en: She couldn't believe (that) it was all happening again.

sentences.cn: 有三位船员失踪。相信是淹死了。
sentences.en: Three sailors are missing, believed drowned.

sentences.cn: 相信我，她不适合你。
sentences.en: Believe me, she's not right for you.

sentences.cn: 一点也不要相信那些话。

sentences.en: I do believe you're right (= I think sth is true, even though it is surprising).

sentences.en: I find that hard to believe .

sentences.en: I don't believe you!

sentences.en: I was a physical and emotional wreck — I still can't believe how I ever got any work done.

sentences.cn: 我简直不敢相信自己的眼睛。她比我想象的漂亮多了。
sentences.en: I could not believe my eyes. She was far more beautiful than I had imagined.

sentences.cn: 他听起来似乎并不相信她。
sentences.en: He did not sound as if he believed her...

sentences.cn: 永远不要相信一个已婚男人说的任何有关他妻子的话。
sentences.en: Never believe anything a married man says about his wife...

sentences.cn: 我不相信有鬼。
sentences.en: I don't believe in ghosts...

sentences.cn: 你相信魔法真的存在吗？
sentences.en: Do you believe in magic?

sentences.cn: 其他人类学家相信发明等文化创新只有一个起源，并且从一个社会传承到另一个社会。
sentences.en: Other anthropologists believed that cultural innovations, such as inventions, had a single origin and passed from society to society.

sentences.cn: 可是，由于这些连接需要通过努力和练习来形成，因此科学家相信，智力的拓展和波动取决于脑力活动。
sentences.en: However, because these connections are made through effort and practice, scientists believe that intelligence can expand and fluctuate according to mental effort.

sentences.cn: 当你努力想要实现一个重要目标时，应该相信自己，确信自己做出的是最佳决定。
sentences.en: When   you are struggling to achieve something important you should believe in   yourself and be sure that your decision is the best.

sentences.cn: 尽管悲伤的北极熊和各种图表都表明碳排放量在飙升，很多人还是很难相信全球变暖会影响到他们自身。
sentences.en: Despite  mournful polar bears and charts showing carbon emissions soaring, most people find it hard to believe that global warming will affect them personally.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 大部分的青少年都觉得父母可以理解他们，而且他们相信父母把家庭摆在了生活中最重要的位置。
sentences.en: Most feel that their parents understand them, and they believe their family is the No. 1 priority in their parents’ lives.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: （只有当你相信患者可以无限制地接受劣质治疗时，这才可能是真的。）
sentences.en: (That would be true only if you believed that patients should have an unrestrained right to treatments proven to be inferior.)
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但我们相信谈判会有效果。
sentences.en: We believe negotiation could work.
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 人们一直都相信存在“男性”大脑和“女性”大脑这一说法，认为这可以解释所有的性别差异。
sentences.en: Many men and women have long bought into the idea that there are “male” and “female” brains, believing that explains just about every difference between the sexes.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 但最主要的，我讨厌付小费是因为我相信如果雇员的工资完全由雇主决定，就像几乎所有其他产业一样，我会更加享受。
sentences.en: But mostly, I hate tipping because I believe I would be in a better place if pay decisions regarding employees were simply left up to their employers, as is the custom in virtually every other industry.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 一些专家称，还是有合理理由相信低油价是会推动世界经济的。
sentences.en: Some experts say there are still good reasons to believe cheap oil should heat up the world economy.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我很多年都对他的谎话信以为真。
sentences.en: I believed his lies for years.

sentences.cn: 那个男人自称是社会福利工作者，老妇人信以为真。
sentences.en: The man claimed to be a social worker and the old woman believed him.

sentences.cn: 瘫痪暗示:受术者错误的以为自己瘫痪.
sentences.en: Disable . Subjects incorrectly believe they are disabled.

sentences.cn: 汤姆完全把我们的笑话信以为真了.
sentences.en: Tom? e believed our joke , hook, line, and sinker.

sentences.cn: 他像孩子一样单纯,对一切都信以为真.
sentences.en: He believes everything with childlike simplicity.

sentences.cn: 设想你们全都被催眠了,以为屋子里有一只老虎.
sentences.en: Imagine all of you are hypnotized to believe there is a tiger in this room.

sentences.cn: 别以为我相信那件事.
sentences.en: You can scarcely expect me to believe that.

sentences.cn: 汉堡市的纳粹市长曾误以为他是英国将军而向他投降.
sentences.en: The Nazi mayor of Hamburg surrendered to him, believing him to be a British general.

sentences.cn: 他当时不信, 也不以为然.
sentences.en: He didn't believe, and he did not care, too.

sentences.cn: 那些雇员以为他们人多势众, 但是他们大错特错了.
sentences.en: The employees believed that there was safety in numbers, but were grossly mistaken.

sentences.cn: 你以为你看到过无可置疑的物证,可以证明他们的口供是假的.
sentences.en: You believed that you had seen unmistakable documentary evidence proving that their confessions were false.

sentences.cn: 似乎人们总以为自己两眼一闭,这世界就不存在了.
sentences.en: You always believe somehow that the world will end with your death.

sentences.cn: 责令西西弗推石的诸神以为这是对他最严厉的惩罚.
sentences.en: The deities believed that this was the toughest punishment.

sentences.cn: 为什么在你和你母亲以为他已经死了25年之后?
sentences.en: Why let you and your mother believe that he's been dead for 25 years?

sentences.cn: 这种观察,我以为是不正确的.
sentences.en: I believe they are wrong.

sentences.cn: 她以为认错了人, 把头掉了过去.
sentences.en: Believing that she was mistaken, she turned her head away.

sentences.cn: 但是其他恐龙都不相信小脚板,以为它只是眼花看错.
sentences.en: Unfortunately he is the only one who saw and no one believes his story.

sentences.cn: 5我告诉他那消息时, 他不相信我,以为我是在开玩笑.
sentences.en: He didn't believe me when I told him the news. He thought that I was kidding him.

sentences.cn: 你以为你最需要的专业发展的方面是 什么 ?
sentences.en: What do you believe are the areas in which you require the most professional development?

sentences.cn: 他们以为这些趋势可以直接以普遍规律来推演.
sentences.en: They believe that these tendencies can be immediately derived from universal laws alone.

sentences.cn: 我也假装信以为真,帮了他一把.
sentences.en: I pretended to believe him and helped.

sentences.cn: 你也许是在开玩笑,但她却愚蠢得信以为真.
sentences.en: You may be joking but she's simple enough to believe you.

sentences.cn: “那末,”费克斯咬着牙回答说,“您 真 以为我们要上利物浦去 吗 ?”
sentences.en: Then you believe that we really are going to Liverpool?'

sentences.cn: 她一直以为他们的婚姻是完全合法和有约束力的.
sentences.en: She had believed it was all legal and binding enough.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 但笔者以为, 这恰恰是对社会制度的一个考验.
sentences.en: I believe, however, that a social system is on trial here.

sentences.cn: 乘客误以为自己处于惯性系中,且不受外力作用.
sentences.en: The passengers are deluded into believing themselves to an inertial frame with no forces acting.

sentences.cn: 没有人比那些误以为自己是自由的人更处于无望的被奴役状态的了.
sentences.en: None are so hopelessly enslaved as those who falsely believe they are free.

sentences.cn: 真是谎话连篇! 你以为我会信 吗 ?
sentences.en: What a lollapallooza! You expect me to believe that?

sentences.cn: 有人以为没有皇帝, 中国就算是民主国家,百事大吉,天下太平了.
sentences.en: Some people seemed to believe that with the abolition of the emperor, China had become a democratic country and that hence forth everything would take its proper course.

sentences.cn: 所以, 对中华传统思想的评击,中外人们都比较容易接受,信以为真.
sentences.en: Therefore, attacks on Chinese traditional thought are relatively easy to accept and believed.

sentences.cn: 人们一度认为地球是平的。
sentences.en: People used to believe (that) the earth was flat.

sentences.cn: 警方认为那个人可能携有武器。
sentences.en: Police believe (that) the man may be armed.

sentences.cn: 专家们认为即将发生的旱灾将侵袭大片地区。
sentences.en: Experts believe that the coming drought will be extensive...

sentences.cn: 他认为婚内应该忠诚。
sentences.en: He believed in marital fidelity.

sentences.cn: 我们认为，假如动物掌管了实验室，它们会对我们进行测试，以确定我们的忍耐度、忠诚度以及方位记忆力。
sentences.en: We believe that if animals ran the labs, they would test us to determine the limits of our patience, our faithfulness, our memory for locations.

sentences.cn: 这些作家认为，新闻报道是一种职业，他们为自己的作品能够刊登在日报上而感到自豪。
sentences.en: These men believed in journalism as a calling, and were proud to be published in the daily press.

sentences.cn: 微软的首席隐私官布兰登·林奇在博客中写道：“我们认为用户应该拥有更多的控制权。”
sentences.en: Brendon Lynch, Microsoft’s chief privacy officer, blogged: “We believe consumers should have more control.”

sentences.cn: 他认为，优雅并非来自于繁多。
sentences.en: Elegance, he believed, did not derive from abundance.

sentences.cn: 如果受试者很快选取了一张不真实的、比真人更美的照片一大多数受试者都会这样做——那说明他们由衷地认为这就是自己真实的样子。
sentences.en: If the subjects quickly chose a falsely flatteringimage—which most did—they genuinely believed it was really how they looked.

sentences.cn: 年轻人和老年人均聚焦于一个关键点:两组人群中的绝大多数人都认为，相比于长辈们,现在的年轻人更难开展人生旅程。
sentences.en: Young and old converge on one key point: Overwhelming majorities of both groups said they believe it is harder for young people today to get started in life than it was for earlier generations.

sentences.cn: 我们常常认为，一份新工作、一个大房子或一辆好车就是可以使我们获得最终满足感的灵丹妙药，但现实是，这些东西很少会对我们 的幸福感产生持久性的影响。
sentences.en: Too often we believe that,a new job, bigger house or better car will be the magic silver bullet that will allow us to finally be content, but the reality is these things have little lasting impact on our happiness levels.

sentences.cn: 特罗尼克认为,仅仅因为孩子没有从数字产品上学到东西并不意味着它没有任何价值一特别是如果它能让父母有时间去洗澡,做家务或只是暂时离开孩子休息一下
sentences.en: Tronick believes that just because a child isn't learning from the screen doesn't mean there's no value to it—— particularly if it gives parents time to have a shower, do housework or simply have a break from their child.

sentences.cn: Weber 教授认为环保政策也可以利用相同的方法。
sentences.en: Professor Weber believes that environmental policy can make use of similar  tactics .

sentences.cn: Climate Solidarity 运 动 的 项 目 主 管Nick Perks  认为这类行动预示着未来环保行动的方式。
sentences.en: Nick Perks, project director for Climate Solidarity, believes this sort of activity is where the future of environmental action lies.

sentences.cn: 和一些成见相反，大部分青少年认为他们必须容忍个体之间的差异（虽然他们发现这在拉帮结派的中学环境中不太容易）。
sentences.en: Contrary to some stereotypes, most adolescents believe they must be tolerant of differences among individuals (though they do not always find this easy in the cliquish ( 拉帮结派的) environment of high school).
sentences.from: 16年6月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 部分原因在于，这一现象总是发生在失业率很高的时期，还有一部分原因在于，那些专家和分析人士认为，如果宣称问题根深蒂固，很难解决，那么就会让人觉得他们很有深度。
sentences.en: Part of the answer is that this is what always happens during periods of high unemployment—in part because experts and analysts believe that declaring the problem deeply rooted, with no easy answers, makes them sound serious.

sentences.cn: 由于近年来美国学生的标准化测试成绩一直在 (31) 下降，一些管理人员认为学生应该花更多时间在教室里，而不是在操场上。

sentences.cn: 人们一直都相信存在“男性”大脑和“女性”大脑这一说法，认为这可以解释所有的性别差异。
